This dress was perfect. It fit well, especially as I am only 5 ft tall.

评论概述: Cute but need the right body type for the dress
评论详情: This dress was very cute. The fabric was thin and a light color, so I would recommend a slip underneath. I have a very small chest, and it was not flattering in me and slid down since it's strapless. I think it would look great and work well for a B or C cup with a strapless bra.
Dress fits perfect and it’s very flattering for someone making height 5’1
I returned bc I’m heavy chested and it made me look very top heavy.

This dress was perfect for a summer wedding! I loved the fit and the vibrant colors. I’m not sure how long it will hold up- it had some loose threads around the seams right out of the package, but shouldn’t be a big deal if you’re only going to wear it occasionally.

评论概述: Love the print but faded slightly after washing!

Poor value for the money. Thin, very wrinkly.

There is a filter on the image, so the picture doesn't give a good representation of the teal color. I liked this teal dress for beach pictures. It was comfortable and made for a cute outfit. It helped elevate my beach vacation.

Lovely dress, received compliments both times I wore it, however fabric shredded after the second wash. It’s along a seam so I will try to fix it, however this was not a seam coming loose. The fabric ripped clear through. There is evidence of other soon to be years as well. I didn’t realize this was a disposable dress.
Dress was sent back it was see through and I did not want to wear a slip. pretty but not functionable.
Very pretty the fit was perfect
The colors were beautiful for a summer wedding. Very comfortable and flattering for expecting moms as well!
Prob my favorite dress purchase off Amazon ever
Really like this dress. The fabric is soft and flowy.  I had to steam it when it arrived but it was no problem. True to size and very comfortable.
I loved this dress as an option for family beach photos. It is a light and airy fabric; and the one shoulder style is flattering, even with a larger chest.

It's a good summer dress, it just has a couple things that I didn't like. The fabric was a bit more see through then I expected. It has an extra layer but still see through. The one shoulder strap kinda bugged me but i just don't personally like that style one me! I will be returning it but overall it's a cute summer dress.
I loveeeee this dress

True to size, great color and good quality fabric.

The dress fit nicely on too and really beautiful on , i wore the. Dress to. All. White  party.  Received comments from people.

I’m 4’11 and the small hit perfectly!
Pretty dress, fits well, but exchanging for different color. I purchased the cream with pink flowers and the dress is unlined/see through. Not interest in wearing extra layers in the summer heat!

I no have this in 3 colors. I took the black and teal with me on vacation and found myself wearing them more than anything else I packed. Easy to change up the look with jewelry or scarves. I love that this dress is breathable and looks fine with some wrinkles. I am 5’ with 34DD and it fits perfectly and makes my waist look snatched and skims over my FUPA. Did I mention how breathable and comfy it is in a hot summer? Can’t wait to order a few more colors! Hope they come out with a Kelly green.
This dress is super comfy and flattering. Received lots of compliments

I’m 5’3 , 135lbs and I ordered a size small! The quality of the material was worth the money. The dress came very wrinkled so I did a lot of ironing. The length of the dress fell right at my ankles. The top of the dress was nice and flattering and the bottom half of the dress was flowy and had an undergarment piece so you can’t see through it. This was great for my family pictures. Very casual but cute!

I’m only 5’ tall so this dress is the perfect maxi length on me. Great fabric and I got white which is fully lined. The top is very secure so I’m comfortable with just nipple covers and no bra (36DD). Love love love this dress
Good quality dress, fit is good does wrinkle but smoothes out easily
Love this style of dress. Fits true to size. plz make more colors and put them on sale more often. thanks, and be blessed!
Bought this to wear on white night in a cruise.  Comfortable and cute
I get so many compliments when I wear this dress. Easy to pack. Lightweight. Flattering.
Love the pretty fabric and unique style. I wore this out to dinner and compliments from my husband and restaurant staff!
Comfortable fit! Reasonable price. Easy to accessorize.

I wore this to an outdoor summer wedding and it was perfect! I got tons of compliments and it was light enough for the heat! I did order a small and think I could have even gone down to an XS! It has a good amount of stretch! Great dress for the price.

Dress was so airy and light! If you have breasts that hang low, it’s not supportive BUT you definitely could have not worn anything but nipple covers if not! Not see through or anything! The light green is a mint color and that blue floral one is a bright blue! I ordered a M and it was pretty roomy everywhere - I’m 5’6” and about 150 lbs so that surprised me! I got a S the second time and it fit perfect!

Was a little leery of the elastic in the chest area, since I am a bit busty.  I'm 5' 2" and 125 and I ordered a Medium. The dress fits perfectly.  Looking forward to wearing it.  The material is light weight but not see through.  The length is great.  No alterations needed.  I ordered the bright pink (not lined) and the white (lined)
I LOVE this dress.  Excellent quality and fit.
Runs big, not made for petite women.

love the patterns & fit, but this specific pattern has no lining so it’s extremely thin (although not see through). I’d only recommend buying if it’s on super sale (like $25 max…)  IG: @homeswithchristina

This dress is such a good length on me. I'm 5'7" and I love how this hits below my knee so I don't have to worry about the length at all. The one shoulder look is so flattering, I was a little unsure how I would feel about it right away but I've gotten so many compliments anytime I wear it.
This dress is a must buy for spring and summer. I wore it to a party and received many compliments.
This dress is so cute and light weight! Perfect for summer!

I bought this as an option to wear to a spring wedding. I’m 4 months postpartum and am 5’2” and weigh about 170 right now. The length is perfect. I’m nursing so my chest is larger than my normal 36DD. I bought a large which fits well but i definitely could’ve gone down to a medium. The top is super stretchy and will be great for breastfeeding since it’s easy to pull up and down. I can even wear a strapless bra since it’s secure enough to hold them up a little.
I didn’t like the quality or the fit. Probably because I was sent a L instead of a S.
I Love this Dress.  M- Chartreuse.  Fits well,  great for hot summer evening.  Would like to purchase a solid color too.

LOVE this dress so much! I got it in pink. It’s very true to color & looks just like the picture. The fabric is soft. It exceeded my expectations. It’s so cute. Even though it’s long it doesn’t make me feel matronly because of the bright color & the one shoulder sleeve.

The dress is forgiving. There's enough elastic and fabric to hide what needs to be hidden and hold what needs to be held. I would have preferred that the one shoulder or slightly thinner it has a thicker boxy look to it but overall for the cost it's a wonderful little summer dress for backyard barbecues, beach trips, girls day etc...  5'10 size Medium
I purchased this dress for dressy party. I was disappointed as it was very casual. It’s much cuter in the picture than in person. It did not hang well for my shape, but it was not flattering at all.

评论概述: If you want to wear something that feels like wearing tissue paper..this is the frock for you
评论详情: Completely disappointed.  Although the color was very similar to the photo, the texture and feel of the "fabric" was awful.  It resembled tissue paper.  And if see through is the thing for you..and I mean COMPLETELY see thru, then this frock is the way to go.  Everything about it felt cheap and raw....
Looked great on and fit perfect. Easy to wash and great value for the money.
I loved the coloring! Very bright and the fit of it was good. Large chest approved.
Was well worth the money. Fit was awesome. I’m 5 ft 2 in 154 lbs and medium fit great.
The fabric is not as pretty in person as the picture shows.  I was disappointed with the dress.
I bought this dress to wear to an informal wedding coming up. It’s even cuter than the pictures. I plan to wear a shrug type sweater but it looks good with a Jean jacket for more casual wear.
Very cute and made well. Fits longer on me because I'm short, but overall fits like a smaller small. I'm 4'10 105lb

Rayon material is so cool and soft and comfortable to wear it’s one of my favorite materials for a dress or blouse This one shoulder is so cute on true to size medium 5’4 and 155 lbs love the rose color

I got a large due to my bust… fit perfectly.. looks great .. comfortable.  Side shoulder makes it a unique and fun dress to wear … going to wear it for Mother’s Day … I’m going back to link to order more !!!

this dress was NOT what was seen in the picture, it was see through, the color was not as described or pictured, terrible and cheap material, overall NOT a good clothing product! it truly looked like it was made for a child to wear.

I bought this dress to wear for my bridal shower. It didn’t seem see through at all, but light undergarments would definitely be best just to be safe. The top gave some stretch, but didn’t squeeze too much under the arms. Was perfect for the event and plan to wear again in the spring!

I love the fit of this dress, length and everything is great however the colors are very bright.. the picture looks more like burnt orange and sage green however it’s almost neon it’s so bright and didn’t match the other outfits I had picked out for my family to coordinate for Easter

I bought this dress for a summer wedding. I went out on a limb with the yellow/green color, but I received so many compliments! It was light weight and very easy to dance in. I loved the one strap and the way the dress made me feel and look thin!
This is the second dress of this style I bought. I always get compliments when I wear it.
Love this dress! Fits great and true to size.
